headline.main: CAUCASUS CALLED SAFE FOR WINTER; Russian Commander Expects No Drive for Baku Oil Fields Till Spring

lead_paragraph: TABRIZ, Iran, Nov. 29 -- "Reichsfuehrer Hitler will not attack the Caucasus and the Baku oil fields before late Spring. He will attempt to destroy the Red Army by marching to Astrakhan," stated Red Army Major Gen. V.V. Novikoff, Commander in Chief in the Caucasus, to your correspondent in an interview.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
